Another day, another ridiculous corporate buzzword—this time, it's Task Masking. Apparently, some workers are pretending to work by walking around with their laptops, furiously typing on blank documents, and sighing dramatically to look busy. But isn’t that just… the office?

In this video, I break down the absurdity of task masking, how it plays into corporate politics, and why these trends always seem to blam
title: TASK MASKING  - THE NEXT DUMB CORPORATE BUZZWORD!
